name: Coub.com Dark Pink
description:
I will stop maintaining this style, since coub.com is continuously fucking up their website style and I am sick of fucking around with their shitty css.

It was a pleasure to help you guys out for some time at least but for now I will drop coub.com totally out of my life, since I don't see a dark theme coming from them soon so this site is literally unusable and get's with every update even shittier.

A dark pink coub.com style that wont hurt your eyes
